title: Andy Street – 2023 Comments on Crooked House Pub
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Andy Street, the Mayor of the West Midlands, on Twitter on 8 August 2023.
content:
We’ve asked @south_staffs to ensure the Crooked House Pub is rebuilt brick by brick, & any attempt to change its use blocked 🚫.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector
  *[CEOs]: chief executive officers
  *[OECD]: Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development
  *[ESA]: Employment and Support Allowance

  *[SEND]: special educational needs and/or disabilities

 ]: education inspection framework

@alex__claridge & I have also asked to be kept informed of the Fire & Police’s investigation.
